Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.server

Class ClientSkeleton

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.server.ClientSkeleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Remote
public class ClientSkeleton extends Object implements Client
This class is used in socket protocol, it receives the update from the client through his server stub and forwards them to the server implementation.
